ygData.subject: The 50 Project: Overview
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, time to reveal what the heck The 50 Project is. The 50 is a reference to 50 somethings. Project is a reference about this topic being a project.

Subject: The 50 Project: Overview
Message-ID: <9hnr5e+btbk@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 3092
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Ok, time to reveal what the heck 'The 50 Project' is.

'The 50' is a reference to 50 somethings.
'Project' is a reference about this topic being a project.

Taken together, this means this topic is about this area working on 
creating 50 brand new scenarios for gladiator.  The scenarios will be 
start from startch with a brand-new team (not an experienced team).

How do I propose getting this accomplished?  By doing this in parts.  
LOL.

Part 1 will be about creating TEXT for the scenarios and a basic 
description for the scenarios.  This description will include list of 
opponents, named opponents, friendly NPCs, named friendly NPCs, and a 
description of the grid.  I expect this to take from 100 to 150+ days 
to do 50 scenarios.

Part 2 will be about creating the scenarios, incoporating the text for 
the scenarios.  I expect this to take from 300 to 350+ days for 50 
scenarios.

Part 3 will be about dedugging and testing scenarios.  I expect this 
to take 100 to 150+ days.

Part 4 will be about putting them all together in an archive and 
posting them online - approximately all of 5 hours tops.

In addition to doing these by part number, these are also going to be 
done by part letter.

A will be about working on the 1st 5 or so scenarios.
B will be about working on the 2nd 5 or so scenarios.
C will be about working on the 3rd 5 or so scenarios.
D will be about working on the 4th 5 or so scenarios.
E will be about working on the 5th 5 or so scenarios.
F will be about working on the 6th 5 or so scenarios.
G will be about working on the 7th 5 or so scenarios.
H will be about working on the 8th 5 or so scenarios.
I will be about working on the 9th 5 or so scenarios.
J will be about working on the 10th 5 or so scenarios.

Why 5 scenarios at a time?  To keep from filling overwhelmed.

So what will happen I will start with 50 Project?  I will start tih 
50P: Part A1.  Once A1 is completed, Part A2 will start and so will 
Part B1.  This same pattern will continue.

Telvido, I ask you to write the basic story arc for these 50 as you 
volunteered to do so.

Are there any catches?  Yep.  If somebody should ever start working on 
Gladiator:Beyond Freedom, they will get free access [nobody working on 
that part gets ANY money from doing so] to the scenario descriptions 
so that they can equip that game with 50 scenarios.  Anyone else who 
wants access to the descriptions also gets free access.

Before we start this project, I will ask for a minimum of 8 
volunteers: at least 2-3 people to create scenarios and everybody to 
help with debugging and creating text and descriptions for scenarios.

What will I be doing during this project?  Keeping things on track; 
going through the membership list to remove bad email addresses and 
check to find more people interested in a gladiator tournament; and 
working on both my own scenarios and the 50 Project Scenarios.

About the name for this project, any better name will be considered 
and probably be used.

To be honest, I don't expected this project to generate that many 
messages posted to this group.
